name: Sylvan Song
description:
Featuring 3D Assets by Shapes Assets, Tibor Szijjarto, 8bull and MalberS Animations

Sylvan Song is a simple, visual-narrative puzzle solving game about renewing colorful life to a dead, blackened world. 

Developed as a short, accessible and cinematic adventure, Sylvan Song is about admiring natural beauty through environmental expression, and using the magic of music to restore a broken land. 

Created by myself and Sam Celeste in two weeks.
